TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. Two humans in the universe know what your avatar is.

I wish paper had a copy/paste function.

Granted, however, it will not allow you to, as there is no right-click, ctrl C, or ctrl V, and you cant plug in a mouse, keyboard, or laptop computer into paper sheets.

 

I wish I had enough patience to go to Duna and come back.
Bringing the thread back

On December 9, 2015 at 5:51:29 PM, CommanderCoye said:

Granted, however, it will not allow you to, as there is no right-click, ctrl C, or ctrl V, and you cant plug in a mouse, keyboard, or laptop computer into paper sheets.

 

I wish I had enough patience to go to Duna and come back.

Granted.  You have no time warp.

Wish not wished therefore auto-corrupted

 

 

I wish I could build a realistic submarine

Quote
4 hours ago, CommanderCoye said:

Wish not wished therefore auto-corrupted

 

 

I wish I could build a realistic submarine

 

Granted, however your sub is a diesel sub and you just ran out of electrical power underwater. 

I wish to understand blender to make some cockpits.

Granted, however, your computer dies  and you lose all progress.

 

 

I wish @HoloYolo was here.

Wish granted, but she/he kills you.

I wish for everything I ever wanted with no side effects, things going wrong, or anything that could corrupt my wish to make it not how I meant it.

(Have fun corrupting that >:D)

Wish granted. Everything you ever wanted as of 9:00 on December 18, 2015 will come true 7 minutes after you die.

I wish that I could un-corrupt sfs files.

Granted. You have no sfs files.

I wish for the scene change crash to go away forever.

Granted. KSP has been wiped out of existence, so no scene-change crashes anymore. 

I wish for Jool-optimized wingsuit.

Granted. The Jool system disappears entirely from the game.

 

I wish that I could turn back time to change things I did in the past.

Granted. You get vaporized in a wormhole, then your dust lands on the sidewalk that past You is walking on, and past You decides to walk around it instead of straight like you originally did.

I wish I could see microwaves.

Granted. Your eyes cook to the consistency of hard-boiled eggs due to placing your head in the microwave oven after cheating the interlocks.

 

I wish for a new laptop

Granted. The laptop explodes into pieces on boot up

 

I wish to be in KSP

Granted. You are now in KSP, and permanently appear as one of the Squad Monoliths, anchored in place and forever silent.

 

I wish NOT to be in KSP.

Edited December 23, 2015 by Xorth Tanovar

Granted. Now you are part of the Russian Space Program and you are the commander of the Soyuz 11.

 

I wish NASA had a bigger budget than the military.

5 hours ago, Jeanjvs said:

Granted. Now you are part of the Russian Space Program and you are the commander of the Soyuz 11.

 

I wish NASA had a bigger budget than the military.

 

Granted.  NASA no longer exists because we were invaded.  I wish for the will to go down to my other computer and play KSP.

Granted, but storms knock out your electricity and your laptop battery just died...

I wish it were still raining.

Granted. It is raining ash because Yellowstone just erupted...

I wish I was fast at solving big cubes.

Granted, you solve them so fast they fly apart before the solution is reached.

I wish I could fly.

Granted.

You believe you can fly

You believe you can touch the sky

You think about every night and day

You spread your wings and FALL like Icarus.

 

I wish for a drawing idea.

23 hours ago, TrainEngie said:

Granted.

You believe you can fly

You believe you can touch the sky

You think about every night and day

You spread your wings and FALL like Icarus.

 

I wish for a drawing idea.

 

 

Granted, you lose the ability to draw, at least you got that idea!

I wish for an X-Wing.

Granted. The government finds it, confiscates it and kidnaps you in Area 51 because they believe you're an alien because you have a working warp drive and OP engines that defy gravity.

I wish for KSP to take only a few seconds to load.

Granted, now it's littered with bugs, so many bugs that KSP had to be cancelled, and KSP's cancellation caused society to break down, slowly becoming more aggressive as people realize their fate. Praise the Kraken.

I wish I had an old, fancy radio.
